tweet.html: RT @usembvienna: 'The Economic Cooperation Act established the Economic Cooperation Administration to administer the European Recovery Program (#MarshallPlan).' - From @HistoryAtState’s new online resource: Administrative Timeline of the @StateDept: bitly.com/2I76mMX #Marshall70
